Paragraph: The combination effects of the DPP to TPD ratio with changes in the alkyl chain could affect the π-π stacking distance of P1 , P3 , P4 , P5 , and P7 and backbone planarity , thus influencing their charge transport properties.

Let's think step by step.

| --- |

| π-π stacking distance of P3 |
| π-π stacking distance of P4 |

| π-π stacking distance of P7 |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities that clearly refer to material properties in the given paragraph:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| π-π stacking distance of P1 |
| π-π stacking distance of P3 |
| π-π stacking distance of P4 |
| π-π stacking distance of P5 |
| π-π stacking distance of P7 |

These entities refer to the spatial arrangement of molecules in a material and how they interact with each other, which are important material properties that can affect charge transport.

I removed "backbone planarity" from the list as it is not a property of the material but rather a property of the molecular structure.
